messages.zh: 第十六关（前）
——就是这样，陈长官。
messages.en: ——And that’s it, officer Ch’en.

messages.zh: 收到。
messages.en: Copy.

messages.zh: 近卫局会保证汇合地点的安全，等候你们护送目标抵达。
messages.en: The Guard Bureau will secure the safety of the convening location, and wait for you and the target.

messages.zh: 明白。
messages.en: Understood.

messages.zh: 芙兰卡，把侦查小队绘制的地图给我——
messages.en: Franka, give me the map the reconnaissance squad drew——

messages.zh: 嗯，这样就行。我们会沿最短路径离开贫民区。
messages.en: Emm, this would work. We’ll soon leave the slum by the shortest route.

messages.zh: 还有其他指示吗，陈长官？
messages.en: Any other orders, officer Ch’en?

messages.zh: 动作快点。时间不等人。通话结束。
messages.en: Make haste. The time is tight. Over.

messages.zh: ——收队！别磨蹭！！
messages.en: ——Retreat! Stop loafing around!!
……Hah, she hang up……

messages.zh: 也就是说，我们现在要给她跑腿？
messages.en: Does that mean, we have to run this errand for her now?

messages.zh: 毕竟是我们找到了目标......
messages.en: Well, it is us that found the target……

messages.zh: 龙门近卫局并没有向我们出示过任何目标的具体资料。
messages.en: Lungmen Guard Bureau didn’t give us any detailed info on the target.

messages.zh: 明明是合作者，却只能用照片找人——
messages.en: We are collaborators, but we could only search for her with a photograph——

messages.zh: 我们缺少了许多关键信息。
messages.en: We lacked many critical information.

messages.zh: ......近卫局不过多透露信息是理所当然的。
messages.en: It’s natural for the Guard Bureau to hold back from us.

messages.zh: 为什么？
messages.en: Why is that?

messages.zh: 你那聪明脑瓜现在转不过来了？知道太多对罗德岛有什么好处？
messages.en: Can’t your clever brain turn around now? What good would it do for Rhodes Island to know too much?

messages.zh: 我只理解知道太少对任务有害。
messages.en: I only know that knowing too little is bad for the mission.

messages.zh: 总之，我们得先把米莎护送到汇合地点。
messages.en: Anyway, We need to escort Misha to the convening location.

messages.zh: 路线的选择，唔——
messages.en: And the choice of the route, huh——

messages.zh: 又得麻烦他们了。
messages.en: We have to bother them again.

messages.zh: 哟，罗德岛的各位~
messages.en: Yoo, Rhodes Island~

messages.zh: 任务是不是很快就完成了？“企鹅”的服务如何？
messages.en: The mission’s near finished right? How would you rate “the Penguin”’s service?

messages.zh: ——我就知道。
messages.en: ——I knew it.
Sigh……

messages.zh: 别这么~垂头丧气的嘛。发生什么不开心的事情了？
messages.en: Don’t~be so upset. Is anything bothering you?

messages.zh: 你。
messages.en: You.

messages.zh: 别这么说，没有企鹅物流的情报，罗德岛也没法把搜索范围缩小至这一片区的。
messages.en: Don’t be so rude, without Penguin Logistic’s intel, Rhodes Island couldn’t have narrowed the search down to this area.

messages.zh: 这位小姐，多谢夸奖！你还是很识货的！
messages.en: Thank you, my lady! You really have an eye for this!

messages.zh: 能天使，我们需要一条比较安全的路线。
messages.en: Exusiai, we need a safe route.

messages.zh: 直接说结论吧——哪条都不好走。这条，就这条，嗯，算是最安全的了。
messages.en: I’ll jump to the conclusion——none of them are. This one, yeah this one, um, it’s the safest one relatively.

messages.zh: 然而就算是这条路上埋伏着的敌人也够组好几个合唱团了呢。
messages.en: But even this route’s got enough enemies to form several choruses.

messages.zh: ——难道说......整合运动已经——？
messages.en: ——could it be……that Reunion Movement has already——?

messages.zh: 看来整合运动已经渗透进龙门。我们被围堵了。
messages.en: Looks like Reunion Movement has already infiltrated Lungmen. We’re surrounded.

messages.zh: 首要任务是把米莎安全带出去。
messages.en: The primary mission is to bring Misha out safely.

messages.zh: 芙兰卡，突袭就交给你们了。
messages.en: Franka, I’ll leave the charge to you.

messages.zh: 简单。
messages.en: Easy.

messages.zh: 雷蛇，重装小队负责两翼。米莎也交由你保护。
messages.en: Liskarm, deploy the shield squad to the flanks. I need you to take care of Misha too.

messages.zh: 没问题。
messages.en: No problem.

messages.zh: 博士，请牢牢跟在我身边——请你指挥小队作战，我会传达你的命令。
messages.en: Doctor, stay close to my sides——please take command now, I’ll pass down your orders.

messages.zh: ......我们就走这最安全的路线试试看。
messages.en: ……We’ll try this safest route.
